item.title: CSV to Data Frame: Establishing a Meaningful Standard for Performance Comparisons
item.description: R vs Python Reproducible Python Environment The Data Small Medium Big The Code R “Base” - utils::read.csv() readr::read_csv() data.table::fread() Python pandas.read_csv() Dependencies Only The Test Initial Carpentry The Results Execution Times tl;dr Appendices Controlling for Dependency Load Times Summary Tables Environment IDE R Python System R vs Python Performance comparisons between R and Python suck. Most seem to be run in Jupyter Notebook and many are using Python’s rpy2 library to run poorly optimized R code.
